long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever seen things on 'Trends For You' on Twitter that are not related to my interests? If so, here's the solution. If things that are not related to my interests or that may cause discomfort are displayed on 'Trends For You', you can remove 'Trends For You' using the 'don't show trends' extension.

*It can only be used on English and Korean Twitter.
